quotes.quote: It was a sly trick of God's to give a man work to do - it kept him from asking questions that God couldn't answer.
Cunning and treachery are the offspring of incapacity.
The crafty person is always in danger; and when they think they walk in the dark, all their pretenses are transparent.
A clever mind is not a heart. Knowledge doesn't really care, wisdom does.
A sly old fish, too cunning for the hook.
A sly piece of good luck, which nobody knows of is delightful.
Cunning is the dwarf of wisdom.
The greatest cunning is to have none at all.
Love is a cunning weaver of fantasies and fables.
Cunning differs from wisdom as twilight from open day
It would seem that the more irresponsible and crafty one is, the more likely one is to have a talent for storytelling.
The desire to seem clever often keeps us from being so.
A clever person solves a problem. A wise person avoids it.
It is easy to be clever if you leave something important out.
To be clever in argument is not rationality but rationalization.
Everybody is clever, just in their own ways.
Clever men are good, but they are not the best.
